name: Puppy Popper!
description:
Puppy Popper!  Wonderland! every child's dream is to enter to a store where they can create plush toys straight out of their own imagination! But have you ever wondered what happens to all the plushies who get rejected--and more importantly...where do they go? Find out- at your own risk.  This one is NOT for the faint hearted....

-------------------------Credits:--------------------

Catriona Barclay: Programmer, Character art, Level design

https://beastkotathix.itch.io/

Artem Gulyaev: Programmer, Sound designer, UX/UI

Mark Braasch: Character design, 3D modelling, SFX

https://subbucket.itch.io/

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Games-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
